summary:
Stablecoin Market Profitability - Tether (USDT Stablecoin) Reported $1.48 Billion of Profit in Q1 2023.

 Real World Assets - Real World Assets are a promising application for blockchain technology that are gaining traction.

 Flatcoins - We are particularly interested in ‘flatcoins’ - Stablecoins that track the rate of inflation.

 Total Market Estimate - We conservatively estimate that the total market will significantly exceed USD 10 trillion by 2030.

 Tokenization of Financial and Real-World Assets - Tokenization of financial and real-world assets could be the killer use case driving blockchain breakthrough. $4 trillion in value by 2030.

 Tokenization of Real-World Assets - Tokenization of real-world assets (RWAs) is the fuel that’s needed to propel crypto into the mainstream.

 On-Chain Real World Asset Market - The on-chain Real World Asset (RWA) market is projected to reach $4 trillion to $16 trillion by 2030.

 Tokenization of Securities - The next generation for markets, the next generation for securities, will be tokenization of securities.

 Trillion Dollar Crypto Opportunity - Trillion Dollar Crypto Opportunity: Real World Asset Tokenization

 Inflation-Proof Stablecoins - Flatcoins are the next evolution of stablecoins. (Inflation-Proof Stablecoins)

 Off-Chain Assets in DeFi - Off-chain assets are going to be increasingly important in DeFi, the growth potential is quite considerable.
